desc: ターン毎にＨＰを大回復＆被ダメージ時、確率でＨＰを回復＆攻撃力・防御力・最大ＨＰを２５％アップ＆確率で１回まで戦闘不能を耐える

dictionary.lore: A sphere made from a seed Noel discovered during the Frontier Gate's development. The plants that grow from this variety of seed grow at more quickly when damaged, and their essence grants the sphere heightened regenerative powers. Noel remains dissatisfied with its abilities, however, saying, "Someday I'd like it to grow fast enough to cover an entire island." He is rumored to be at work on improvements.

name: 幻導機・フィラシーダ
